channel.title: edge on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in edge on Blog

item.title: Announcing Microsoft Edge support for Video RTC
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers' elaboration The Video RTC Gateway is now ready to run with Edge Browser over Windows computers and devices. At Interactive Powers, we are really excited that Video RTC platforms and API Framework / Mobile SDK are now supporting Microsoft’s new Chromium based Edge Browser aka Edgium. From now, your real-time applications will work on Microsoft’s latest Edge browser released without any changes or updates in your existing code / services already deployed!
